title: Ep 436 | Jase Meets an Inspirational Woman & Dumb Idols
description:
Jase set out on a mission to scout for potential treasure-hunting sites during his off time when he ran across a treasure that inspired him and moved him to tears! Phil is impressed by Jase's story and says America would be wise to listen. Jase explains how God knowing you is more important than you knowing God, and Phil details what leads to ignorance and why you could end up worshipping dumb idols. And Al highlights the difference between the eagerness to receive spiritual gifts and the desire to be known by God.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV:  https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
